name: replex
description: Replex is a self-hosted tool for replicating Plex libraries between servers or users for sharing media collections and metadata while maintaining organization.
features: Library replication: Copy entire Plex libraries between servers while preserving metadata and organization.
Metadata sync: Transfer posters, descriptions, ratings, and custom fields across Plex instances.
User sharing: Share your media collection with other Plex users without duplicating files.
Selective sync: Choose specific libraries or content to replicate based on filters.
Automated updates: Keep replicated libraries in sync with source changes automatically.
Bandwidth optimization: Transfer only metadata and library structure, not actual media files.
Multi-server support: Manage replication between multiple Plex servers from one interface.
Collection preservation: Maintain custom collections and playlists during replication.
Watch status sync: Optionally sync viewing progress and watched status across servers.
Schedule control: Configure replication to run at specific times to minimize server load.
Conflict resolution: Handle duplicate content intelligently when syncing libraries.
API integration: Connect directly to Plex APIs for reliable and secure data transfer.
